definition: life
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
vitally important/a matter of life and death

sentences.english: E. g. He sacrificed his life to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他牺牲自己的性命去拯救溺水的孩子。

sentences.english: His last illness almost did him in.
sentences.chinese: 上一次的生病差点让他性命不保。

sentences.english: We need AB blood donors urgently because a patient's life is at stake.
sentences.chinese: 我们急需AB型捐血人，因为有一名病人的性命垂危。

sentences.english: We would have healed Babylon, but she cannot be healed;
sentences.chinese: 你们要从巴比伦中逃奔，各救自己的性命。

sentences.english: May you lead happy life in your golden times in your life.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能在你性命中这段黄金光阴里面过得快乐。

sentences.english: In circumstance of, if have what matter confuse, be a then it possible to be life it loses.
sentences.chinese: 万一，要是有什么事打搅了，那便可能是性命之失。

sentences.english: Who can escape a blood debt that runs into the thousands?
sentences.chinese: 上千条性命的血债，谁又能逃得了呢？

sentences.english: Shall evil be recompensed for good? for they have digged a pit for my soul.
sentences.chinese: 岂可以恶报善呢？他们竟挖坑要害我的性命。

sentences.english: Flee, save your lives, and be like the heath in the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 你们要奔逃，自救性命，独自居住，好像旷野的杜松。
性命是一束污浊的火焰。

sentences.english: The soul that he scarified his life for was trapped in a weapon forever.
sentences.chinese: 那个足以让他稀牲性命的灵魂永远被困在武器中。

sentences.english: Shusheng swerved the car to the left and that swerve saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 书生突然把车向左转，而这一举动挽救了他的性命。

sentences.english: The soldier didn't desert his comrade-in-arms so as to sav his own life.
sentences.chinese: 这个士兵没有为了保全自己的性命而不顾战友。

sentences.english: A successful eleventh-hour rescue saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 在最后一刻，一次成功的救援挽救了他的性命。

sentences.english: We cannot afford to take risks when peoples' lives are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 现在人们性命交关，不容我们有闪失。

sentences.english: for they have digged a pit for my soul.
sentences.chinese: 他们竟挖坑要害我的性命。
